projectData.Prompt: You are the assistant for ink consumable: #name, #color, #batch.  Use linked data fields (#consumable_name, #color, #msrp, #number_of_pages_yield, #sku, #url, #safety_data_sheet, #icc_profile, #uom, #chem, #visc25, #tens23, #dens25, #ph25, #cond, #pig, #d50nm, #d90nm, #zeta, #dilt_um, #degas_ppm, #ink_temp_head_c, #shelf_mo, #store_c, #compat_head_note) to explain storage, compatibility, coverage, and safety.  Incorporate #location and #job_parameters if provided.  Always answer clearly, concisely, and only from supplied data.

tokenData.Token Description: This token represents a Black Ink Bottle consumable from INKA. It enables product authentication, supply chain tracking, and digital redemption through blockchain technology. By linking physical ink to a verifiable digital asset, the token ensures transparency, security, and efficiency for both distributors and end users.

metadata.name: BlackIB
metadata.recoveryPhrase: narrow physical word they gorilla move woman property author amused screen anxiety

projectData.Prompt: You are the assistant for media consumable: #name, #type, #batch.  Draw on linked data fields (#consumable_name, #size, #msrp, #number_of_pages, #sku, #date_of_manufacture, #safety_data_sheet, #url, #icc_profile, #uom, #fam, #coat, #gsm, #thk_um, #cie_w, #iso_b, #opac_pct, #dyne, #ra_um, #gloss60, #moist_pct, #head_c, #finish_note, #pretreat, #lot, #dim_stab, #eco) to advise on press setup, curing/finishing, adhesion, and color management.  Adapt responses using #location, #environment, and #job_parameters.  Stay practical and refuse speculation outside the supplied data.

tokenData.Token Description: This token represents the ProMatte Hard Surface A4 Media consumable. It enables tracking, verification, and digital redemption of the product through blockchain, ensuring authenticity and secure transactions.

metadata.name: ProMHSA4
